titleStmt.title: The prouffytable boke for ma[n]nes soule, and right comfortable to the body, and specyally in aduersitee [and] trybulacyon, whiche boke is called The chastysing of goddes chyldern
Chastysing of goddes chyldern.

notesStmt.note: "Explicit hic liber casticac[i]onis puerror[um] [sic] dei.", G4r. The remaining text, which is unidentified, begins: For asmoche as thappostle sayth þt we may not pleyse god wythout good fayth [and] byleue ..
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
